Name: No Response Tonight
Description: You've picked up a recording. The wind is howling in your ears, carrying the whispers. Perhaps, the robot nearby holds the key to unravel the continuation of the story.
QuestDesc: You've picked up a recording. The wind is howling in your ears, carrying the whispers. Perhaps, the robot nearby holds the key to unravel the continuation of the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken Radio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Radio Static)

Dialogues.Speaker: Emotionless Broadcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activating... Performing Onboard Analysis... Alert: Leg Components, Not Found. Main Motor Module, Diagnostic... Requesting Shutdown...

Dialogues.Speaker: Antsy Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dang it, still not working. HQ, this is Rabbit 2, over. Rabbit 2 to HQ, do you copy? Over...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For a long time, there is no response. Only the crackling of static and the sound of your breath can be heard. You wait quietly until someone's voice comes in over the radio once more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Antsy Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rabbit 2 here, I've attempted multiple radio contacts with HQ and received zero response so far... All I can hear out here is Blu checking itself over and over again, and... the wind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Another moment of silence. Just as you turn to leave, the radio crackles with another incoming transmission, the man's voice clearly filled with exhaustion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After fighting those TDs for so many years, I never expected to get stuck in this kind of place... Now Blu's busted, can't stand up or walk, let alone carry me back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Home... It's been a while since I last went home. I hope my family's still doing okay... It's raining, and the rain won't even give me an answer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those Exiles, heh, they don't give a darn where your home is. All they care about is how to intercept your comms and steal your motor and power module when you're least suspecting...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Best of all, I've been looking for Blu's legs all over the place, and turns out they were snatched by Excarats... Haha...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can't run away from bad luck, I guess. Blu, run another check.

Dialogues.Speaker: Emotionless Broadcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activating... Performing Onboard Diagnostic... Alert: Leg Components, Not Found. Main Motor Module, Malfunctioning... Requesting Shutdown...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you fall asleep on me just yet, old pal. You're the only chat buddy I have right now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ... *sigh* Time to go find that motor of yours. You stay awake no matter what, all right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Static. That's all you hear until the radio grows completely silent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The robot mentioned in the recording... That must be it. I should go check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Repaired Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activating... Serial No. 72, Type XV, Combat Piloted Autonomous Droid - Huanglong. Performing Onboard Diagnostic, Number 2,003...

Dialogues.Speaker: Repaired Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Main Motor, Normal. Power Module, Normal. All Functions, Normal...

Dialogues.Speaker: Repaired Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activated. Confirming Mission Orders...

Dialogues.Speaker: Repaired Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Serial No. 72, Type XV, Combat Piloted Autonomous Droid - Huanglong. You may call me Blu.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Records indicate Blu and its operator were massively outnumbered during a Tacet Discord conflict. A retreat order was issued by the operator.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the operator onboard, Blu encountered malfunctions of missing leg components and the main motor, causing Blu to become stranded at this location.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My orders are to remain active and await the operator's return. Repeat, My orders are to remain active.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My orders are to remain active and await the operator's return. Repeat, My orders are to remain active.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ... Orders confirmed. Priority Mission Set: Await for the operator's return. Blu will remain active.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, thank you for helping me find my missing components. I shall now proceed with my mission.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here are some supplies. The Operator once issued the order of "All favors must be returned". As I have detected you have assisted me, then I must offer gratitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured, these are unused and left by the operator. Please accept them.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings. Serial No. 72, Type XV, Combat Piloted Autonomous Droid - Huanglong. You may call me Blu.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My orders are to remain active and await the operator's return.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Main Motor, Normal. Power Module, Normal. All Functions, Normal...

Dialogues.Speaker: "Blu"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The wind is pleasant to hear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activating... Serial No. 72, Type XV, Combat Piloted Autonomous Droid - Huanglong. Performing Onboard Diagnostic: Number 1,783...

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Error. Missing Critical Components: Leg Components. Main Motor Module. Auxiliary Power Unit... Requesting Shutdown...

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Request Denied. Detected last known order from Operator: "You stay awake no matter what". Executing Orders: Performing Onboard Diagnostic...

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken Robot
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Systems Activating... Serial No. 72, Type XV, Combat Piloted Autonomous Droid. Performing Onboard Diagnostic: Number 1,784...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's on a loop. Guess I'll have to get it fixed up first... Let's see if I can find anything nearby.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excarats traces. I should follow it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like Excarats were digging here. Good thing I found the components.
